title: To a Maid Engaged to Joseph

lyrics.text:
To a maid whose name was Mary, the angel Gabriel came. "Fear not," the angel told her,
"I come to bring good news; good news I come to tell you, good news, I say, good news."

But Mary was most troubled to hear the angel's word. What was the angel saying?
It troubled her to hear, to hear the angel's message, it troubled her to hear.

"Fear not, for God is with you, and you shall bear a child. His name shall be called Jesus,
God's offspring from on high. And he shall reign forever, forever reign on high."

"How shall this be?" said Mary, "I am not yet a wife." The angel answered quickly,
"The power of the Most High will come upon you shortly, your child shall be God's child."

As Mary heard the angel, she wondered at his words. "Behold, I am your handmaid,"
she said unto her God. "So be it; I am ready according to your word."

author: Gracia Grindal (1983)
